name: Aztec Jump
description:
Aztec Jump is a beautiful game with lots of unique levels. Have endless fun, collect coins and jump over enemies.

Inspired by the classic game Q*bert!

How To Play:

• Tap the buttons to jump left or right
• Collect coins
• Avoid enemies
• Be awesome to reach the top of the leaderboard

Have fun with this peaceful game that will relax you. Still stimulating but will unwind your brain from a long day before bed.
